com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.prefs

类 PreferencesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.prefs.PreferencesHelper

  • public class PreferencesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods to store additional types of values to SharedPreferences

                                                               java.lang.String key,
                                                               java.util.Date value)
        Stores given date as long value. Long.MIN_VALUE is used if date is null

                                                                      java.lang.String key,
                                                                      java.lang.String[] values)
        Stores strings array as single string. Uses DEFAULT_DELIMITER as delimiter.

      • getStringArray

        public static java.io.Serializable getSerializable(android.content.SharedPreferences prefs,
                                                   java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves serializable object stored as BASE_64 encoded string.

      • save

        public static <T> void save(T obj)
        Stores object marked with PreferenceObject annotation to default SharedPreferences.
        Only fields marked with PreferenceField annotation will be stored.

        Supported fields types: boolean, byte, char, double, float, int, long, short, String, String[], Date, Serializable

        See also Preferences.prefs()

        参数:
        obj - Object to be saved, cannot be null

      • get

        public static <T> T get(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Retrieves object stored with save(Object) method.

      • remove

        public static <T> void remove(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Removes object stored with save(Object) method.

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Checks if object of this class was already stored
